name: Moon Train
overview: Moon Train is a Danish type-in shooter published in the Danish publication: SOFT Special #85/1 (Januar 1985) / no definite name, called "Månelokomotiv" in the magazine, it was written by Kurt Andersen. It sounds somewhat like science fiction, and it is. Would you like to be a locomotive driver on the moon, the day spies and DSB lay the first line across it's face? In this Commodore 64 game you get the opportunity to play locomotive drivers, and the work is at least as demanding and dangerous as in the good old Western days of raids and Indian attacks. On the Moon, it's just UFOs and mines that make you dizzy. However, you do have some defensive options. You can jump with the H key and shoot down enemies with SPACE.
